title: riot please fix rune swapping
body: In the secondary tree, rune swapping almost always swaps the incorrect rune and its really annoying

replies.body: Omg, I thought I was the only one concerned about this problem, they really do need to fix that.
It actually works as intended... Not a bug but feature... What kind of fucking idiot came up with such feature is another question though.
It still tilts me when my unresponsive/uncooperative team mate changes role last few secs, and i have to quickly fix my runepage only to be screwed by this counter intuitive rune swapping.

It's sooooooo frustrating!
Especially if you're last pick and have to change your runes for whatever reason.
i have to dedicate 15 seconds of the champion select to change the secondary tree. i just spam the 2 i want until i get it right
YES PLZ omg its driving me nuts.

Messenger here (dont shoot me) Riot said they are already planning this in an upcoming patch. Look out for it.

I forget the source.
Riot gave up on their community, thats why it hasn't been fixed yet...
